description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-44702)- Support for MINIF and MAXIF functions 
(CELLSNET-44864)- Web links on spreadsheet are opened on the same page where GridWeb is loaded 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-44810)- UpdateLinkedDataSource() doesn't work when Workbook is loaded from stream. 
(CELLSNET-44877)- Deprecated .size() function used in acwmain.js 
(CELLSNET-44801)- Mimic MS Excel behavior when "Enter" key is pressed
(CELLSNET-44793)- Set focus on the formula back when inserting a formula with wrong parameters (invalid formula) 
Performance
(CELLSNET-44847)- Performance issue with GetPivotData function 
(CELLSNET-44832)- Issue with SheetRender.PageCount that takes a long time to calculate worksheet pages 
(CELLSNET-44861)- Range.Copy() method freezes for big Excel ranges 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-44854)- Spreadsheet becomes corrupted when Workbook names is appended to the Named Range
(CELLSNET-44852)- RTL direction is changed to LTR while converting html to excel 
(CELLSNET-44846)- PivotTable is losing filters after RefreshData call 
(CELLSNET-44823)- Pivot Table fails to refresh after changing data source to a Named Range 
(CELLSNET-44814)- Calling PivotTable.CalculateData() causes a crash when there is 1 data column 
(CELLSNET-44799)- Excel file is corrupt after opening and resaving it
(CELLSNET-44790)- CSS style ignored for column widths, row heights and word wrap, etc. - HTML to Excel 
(CELLSNET-44786)- Issue with font-weight and text-align in TD and TH cells - Investigation required 
(CELLSNET-44448)- PivotTable contents are not showing correctly in the output pdf 
(CELLSNET-44892)- Culture settings for Workbook does not take effect for Chart DataLabels using Chart.ToImage 
(CELLSNET-44809)- SUMPRODUCT function with external ranges results in #REF! error 
(CELLSNET-44818)- Long values in cell renders as # string while converting worksheet to image 
(CELLSNET-43623)- Issue with the size of the converted file (Excel to PDF Conversion) 
(CELLSNET-43439)- Considerable increase in the output PDF file size from a relatively smaller Excel file 
(CELLSNET-44842)- Label is missing when a chart is converted into image 
(CELLSNET-44806)- Trendline in the chart is not rendering fine in the output PDF 
(CELLSNET-44737)- SheetRender.ToImage: Chart overlaps the row below it 
(CELLSNET-44885)- Formula gets _xlfn prefix after the calculation of workbook 
(CELLSNET-44884)- Resave operation corrupts the spreadsheet when worksheet name is " or " 
(CELLSNET-44880)- Corrupted output file 
(CELLSNET-44879)- The shapes are not in the same order (as per the original shapes' z order position) 
(CELLSNET-44869)- Removing image from header/footer corrupts the document 
(CELLSNET-44868)- Changing background image of a shape corrupts output xls file 
(CELLSNET-44866)- Line spacing from textbox is lost with simple re-save 
(CELLSNET-44830)- ThreeDFormat.TopBevelWidth and TopBevelHeight are not getting applied 
(CELLSNET-44827)- Open and Save document creates corrupted file. 
(CELLSNET-44817)- Issue with updating External Link's data source and AbsPath 
(CELLSNET-44703)- Font of Chart Data Labels and Legend is changed on opening and re-saving source excel file 
(CELLSNET-44878)- Unable to update address of a GridHyperlink 
(CELLSNET-44857)- Set alternative text for hyperlink if image URL is not correct 
(CELLSNET-44856)- Accessing hyperlink via cell reference is not possible with GridHyperlinkCollection class 
(CELLSNET-44841)- Obsoleted APIs are not identified in Visual Studio 
(CELLSNET-44840)- Width of Auto-Filter's Dropdown is too small to make a selection 
(CELLSNET-44805)- Trendline in the chart is not rendering fine - Aspose.Cells.GridDesktop 
(CELLSNET-44798)- Auto filters are applied to all the columns instead of specific range/columns only
(CELLSNET-44797)- RowFilteredEvent of GridDesktop never occurs 
(CELLSNET-44796)- Hidden rows due to filter remain hidden after removing the filter 
(CELLSNET-44792)- Certain formatting elements in the template XLSM file are not imported correctly 
(CELLSNET-44783)- GridDesktop.Button click event never fires on 200% zoom 
(CELLSNET-44745)- Aspose.Cells.GridDesktop: Paste is Always inactive in context menu 
(CELLSNET-44698)- GridWeb control, column disappear if drag to left. 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-44886)- Save as HTML causes NullReferenceException 
(CELLSNET-44875)- Exception while saving PulseSecure_PriceList_FLAT FILE_Nov2016_102816_v1.0.xlsx excel file to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44874)- Exception while saving PulseSecure_PriceList_FLAT_FILE_Oct2016.xlsx excel file to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44873)- Exception while saving PulseSecure_PriceList_Nov2016_102816_v1.0.xlsx excel file to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44872)- Exception while saving PulseSecure_PriceList_Oct2016_093016_v1.xlsx excel file to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44882)- Value in scientific notation is throwing exception 
(CELLSNET-44849)- Exception is thrown when converting from specific xls to xlsx 
(CELLSNET-44898)- Stack overflow when using FileFormatUtil.DetectFileFormat 
(CELLSNET-44834)- NullReferenceException when calling Workbook.Save 
(CELLSNET-44836)- System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException at Hyperlinks.RemoveHyperlink 
(CELLSNET-44795)- Random System.ArgumentException while deleting row 
(CELLSNET-44782)- IndexOutOfRangeException, while inserting rows on GridDesktop 
(CELLSNET-44781)- IndexOutOfRangeException, while deleting rows on GridDesktop 
(CELLSNET-44770)- Error: Object reference not set to an instance of an object, after inserting a deleting a value 
(CELLSNET-44725)- JavaScript runtime error: Object does not support property or method 'fireEvent'
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
